content.text:
# Draft:Crypto Breaking News

Crypto Breaking News is a Dubai-based digital media platform that covers cryptocurrency, blockchain, and Web3-related topics. It provides updates on market trends, project developments, and regulatory changes relevant to the digital asset industry.
History
Crypto Breaking News was founded in 2018 by Vincenzo Stefanini, an Italian cryptocurrency trader, originally as a tool for personal market tracking. In 2025 the platform opened an international office in Dubai, citing an expansion of its audience.
Coverage
The website focuses on news and developments across various segments of the cryptocurrency sector, including Bitcoin, Ethereum, alternative digital assets, DeFi applications, regulatory updates, and blockchain technology. Its coverage combines original reporting with curated content from publicly available data and press releases.
Team and operations
The editorial team includes Vincenzo Stefanini (Founder and Editor) and Federica Montella (Business Development Manager), supported by agencies Web3 Digital (Dubai) and Osom One (London). The site uses a combination of editorial review and automated tools for content aggregation.
Partnerships
Crypto Breaking News has collaborated as a media outlet with several blockchain conferences.
References
